toys.title: Bob Mackie Barbie Holiday Angel Doll
toys.description: Internationally acclaimed costume and fashion designer Bob Mackie reprises his famed partnership role with one of his style muses, Barbie doll. Framed by soaring sparkly wings and a luminous halo, her striking gown is draped with an embroidered sash and shimmers from every angle as if dipped in gold. May this Bob Mackie x Barbie doll be a source of light and magic for years to come.

toys.title: Barbie Crystal Fantasy Collection Rose Quartz Doll
toys.description: Our second Barbie doll in this series glows with the warmth and serenity of the delicate rose quartz stone. Barbie doll is luminous in a flowing chiffon gown in delicate shades of opaque pink, accented with a sparkling sash and complemented by a genuine rose quartz necklace. Her hair is a cascade of curls with subtle blush highlights, adorned with a crown resembling slivers of gems. The packaging, featuring rose-quartz-inspired details and a glowing light feature, makes for a truly captivating display.

toys.title: Barbie Pink Collection Doll 3
toys.description: The Barbie Pink Collection is a stunning series where classic Barbie glamor meets on-trend fashions. The second doll in the collection is exquisite in an asymmetrical look featuring a double-tiered, ruffle satin gown. The ruched bodice is cinched with a brooch and sparkles with silvery micro sequin details. Dazzling drop earrings complement her side-swept hairstyle, and silver glitter stiletto heels and opera-length gloves are elegant finishing touches. With a Silkstone body and premium, displayable packaging, this bold celebration of Barbie doll’s signature color makes the perfect gift for collectors. Includes a doll stand and Certificate of Authenticity. Doll cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.

toys.title: Barbie Inspiring Women Anna May Wong Doll
toys.description: Anna May Wong is considered the first Chinese American Hollywood movie star. Frustrated with being typecast in stereotypical roles, she founded her own production company in 1924 and continued breaking barriers throughout her career. Wearing a red gown with a golden dragon design, this collectible Barbie doll honors a trailblazing icon.

toys.title: Star Wars C-3PO x Barbie Doll
toys.description: The Star Wars™ x Barbie® collection, inspired by the films’ original concept art, re-imagines iconic Star Wars characters through a distinctive Barbie™ high-fashion filter. Programmed for etiquette and protocol and built by the heroic Jedi Anakin Skywalker, C-3PO™ was involved in some of the galaxy’s most defining moments and thrilling battles. This collectible Star Wars x Barbie® doll takes design inspiration from C-3PO’s legendary look to capture his golden armor in a runway-ready silhouette. Star Wars C-3PO x Barbie® doll shines in a head-to-toe liquid gold look with accents of sheer organza and golden sequins. Polished details include a golden collar, bangles, C-3PO-inspired glasses and a brilliant cincture echoing the droid’s primary power coupler outlet.

toys.title: Barbie Birthday Wishes Doll
toys.description: Barbie Birthday Wishes doll hopes your special day is as sweet as you! Barbie doll is dressed for a special birthday celebration in a floor-length, pink tulle gown with rainbow polka dot print. Butterfly sleeves and a big, beautiful bow detail add even more fun and sweetness, and sparkly hoop earrings complete her party-ready look. In packaging featuring space to write a personalized message, Barbie Birthday Wishes doll makes the perfect gift for someone’s special day. Includes doll stand and Certificate of Authenticity. Doll cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.

toys.title: 2021 Holiday Barbie Doll, Blonde Wavy Hair
toys.description: It's a joyous time of year, when everything appears to sparkle and glisten with holiday magic. Dressed for the occasion, 2021 Holiday Barbie doll shines in a gorgeous gown with off-the-shoulder ruched sleeves and a metallic bodice that shines with sculpted “gemstones.” Her full skirt glistens with silver shimmer, complemented by a voluminous tulle peplum. Silvery “pearl” earrings, sparkling eye makeup and bold red lips complete her glamorous look. Throughout this wondrous season, may your 2021 Holiday Barbie doll bring a glimmer of light, peace and love to you and those you hold dear.

toys.title: Barbie Looks Doll (Original, Blonde Pixie Cut)
toys.description: Featuring on-trend fashions with photo-worthy details, Barbie Looks dolls inspire the stylist within. With brand-new face sculpts and posable articulated bodies, they’re ready to style, pose, photograph and post. This Barbie Looks doll features a unique face sculpt and a blonde pixie cut with shaved, flocked sides. Her premium fashion includes a black crop top, ruched metallic skirt and black booties with a pointed toe. Featuring fresh looks and style personality, Barbie Looks dolls make the perfect gift for stylists, fashion aficionados and Barbie collectors.

toys.title: Barbie Looks Doll (Petite, Curly Red Hair)
toys.description: Featuring on-trend fashions with photo-worthy details, Barbie Looks dolls inspire the stylist within. With brand-new face sculpts and posable articulated bodies, they’re ready to style, pose, photograph and post. This Barbie Looks doll features a unique face sculpt and glossy red curls with high-fashion highlights. Her premium fashion includes a glittery crop top with a matching skirt and knee-high boots with cut-out details. Featuring fresh looks and style personality, Barbie Looks dolls make the perfect gift for stylists, fashion aficionados and Barbie collectors. Discover them all to style the whole crew.

toys.title: Barbie Looks Doll (Tall, Blonde)
toys.description: Featuring on-trend fashions with photo-worthy details, Barbie Looks™ dolls inspire the stylist within. With brand-new face sculpts and posable articulated bodies, they’re ready to style, pose, photograph and post. This Barbie Looks™ doll features a unique face sculpt and long, sleek blonde waves. Her premium fashion includes a white dress with bell sleeves and chic shoulder cutouts. Platform booties complete her look. Featuring fresh looks and style personality, Barbie Looks™ dolls make the perfect gift for stylists, fashion aficionados and Barbie® collectors.

toys.title: @BarbieStyle Barbie and Ken Doll 2-Pack
toys.description: The @BarbieStyle series brings memorable looks from the Instagram account to life. Our latest entry presents the perfect pairing: Barbie and Ken, seen together for the first time in the collection. They each come with two complete luxury resort fashions, perfect for poolside lounging and sunset watching. This duo radiates nonchalant chicness.

toys.title: Ken Doll Wearing Pastel Striped Beach Matching Set – Barbie The Movie
toys.description: Inspired by Ken’s character in the upcoming film, this Ken doll is ready to catch some waves. With a surfboard in tow, Ken wears a beachy, striped matching set. Celebrating Barbie The Movie, this Ken doll makes a great gift for fans and collectors alike.

toys.title: Barbie in Pink Western Outfit – Barbie The Movie
toys.description: This collectible Barbie doll turns heads in her all-pink look. Modeled after the character’s western outfit in Barbie The Movie, the doll wears a matching denim vest and flare jeans with a cowboy hat and boots. She makes a great gift for fans and collectors alike.

toys.title: Mark Ryden x Barbie at the Surrealist Ball
toys.description: Come dance with Barbie at the Surrealist Ball where everything spins like shades of a dream. Designed with Mark Ryden, this set of two Barbie dolls steals the show in their sublime gowns and jewelry. They arrive in premium packaging designed with artwork by Mark Ryden.

toys.title: Ken Doll in White and Gold Tracksuit – Barbie The Movie
toys.description: Ken makes quite the statement in his white and gold disco tracksuit. Inspired by one look in Barbie The Movie, his fashion features a working zipper and real pockets. The metallic accent fabric adds deluxe detail to his cinematic look. Celebrating Barbie The Movie, this Ken doll makes a great gift for fans and collectors alike.

toys.title: Guo Pei Barbie Doll Wearing Golden-Yellow Gown
toys.description: As one of China’s most renowned couturiers, Guo Pei combines her rich cultural heritage with contemporary innovation. She brings this unique combination to life with the intricacy of her signature royal embroidery craftmanship. Barbie doll dazzles in a couture look inspired by Guo Pei’s original design, using a color once reserved for Chinese nobility. The stunning brocade gown features ornate embroidered details and a faux fur trim. A striking golden headpiece, golden accessories, and high-fashion shoes complete her look.

toys.title: 2023 Barbie Lunar New Year Doll Designed by Guo Pei
toys.description: We partnered with renowned Chinese couturier Guo Pei once again to create a resplendent two-piece couture look inspired by a design from one of her past collections. Draped in classic Chinese royal blue, this stunning doll features sumptuous dragon embroidery, balancing artistic heritage with contemporary innovation through Guo Pei’s signature craftsmanship. Golden earrings, a sparkly statement ring, and gold colored pumps complement the custom creation.

toys.title: Gloria Estefan Barbie Doll
toys.description: Taking inspiration from her Cuban heritage and blending Latin rhythms with pop and dance beats, Gloria Estefan’s unique sound catapulted her to stardom, making her one of the most successful crossover artists in the world. Inspired by the iconic music video for Estefan’s chart-topping 1989 hit, “Get on Your Feet,” Barbie doll’s jacket features intricate golden detailing with jeweled accents and a dramatic, oversized lace sleeve. A golden waist chain accentuates her soft leopard belt, while bold thigh-high boots and golden accessories complete her look.

toys.title: Barbie Looks Ken Doll (Blonde with Facial Hair)
toys.description: Featuring on-trend fashions with photo-worthy details, Barbie Looks™ dolls inspire the stylist within. With brand-new face sculpts and posable articulated bodies, they’re ready to style, pose, photograph and post. This Barbie Looks™ Ken® doll features a unique face sculpt with painted facial hair and a blonde pompadour with shaved, flocked sides. His premium fashion includes a black cutoff t-shirt, black vinyl pants and white high-tops.

toys.title: MEGA Barbie The Movie Replica DreamHouse Building Kit
toys.description: Spend a day with Barbie and Ken in a replica of the iconic DreamHouse. As seen in Barbie The Movie, this buildable replica is loaded with playful details including a spiral staircase and a pool with a slide. Assemble the 3-story home with 1795 bricks and pieces, including a kitchen, bar, bedroom, and spa. This hands-on toy for adult collectors also features fashion, food, and pool accessories for the micro-dolls to have a spectacular day in the sun.

toys.title: Barbie Dream House By Mattel, Inc. Doll, House and Accessories
toys.description: Spend a day with Barbie in a replica of her original 1962 Dream House. In honor of Mattel’s 75th anniversary, this vintage reproduction is identical to the original, right down to the mid-century modern décor, self-assembled slim-line furniture and decorative accessories. Barbie doll is included too, and for the very first time, this reproduction includes replicas of vintage fashions and accessories that take Barbie® doll from a day on the town to a dinner party and finally to a relaxing night in. Pick up the telephone to make daytime plans, then reach into the closet for her 1963 Busy Morning sundress, white open-toed mules, wide-brim sun hat and woven shopping bag.

toys.title: Barbie The Movie Pink Corvette Convertible
toys.description: Take home a part of Barbie The Movie with a collectible Barbie Corvette. Inspired by the main character’s car in the film, this bubblegum-pink beauty looks like it cruised right off the big screen. With a curvy silhouette and retro trim, the vintage-inspired ride is a piece of art on four wheels. It features a working trunk and doors, plus steerable, rolling wheels.

toys.title: Hot Wheels RC Barbie The Movie Barbie Corvette
toys.description: Zoom around Barbie Land with the Hot Wheels RC Barbie Corvette! This 1956 Corvette Stingray is based on the one in Barbie The Movie and can hold two Barbie dolls. Place accessories in the trunk that opens and closes. The full-function remote-control vehicle can reach speeds up to 5 miles per hour – take the wheel and send Barbie and a friend on their next road trip.

toys.title: Barbie in Plaid Matching Set – Barbie The Movie
toys.description: This collectible Barbie doll wears an impeccably coordinated three-piece plaid outfit. It’s a look pulled straight from the film, right down to her matching hat and pastel heels. Even her petticoat is perfectly paired in plaid! Celebrating Barbie The Movie, this Barbie doll makes a great gift for fans and collectors alike.

toys.title: President Barbie in Pink and Gold Dress – Barbie The Movie
toys.description: This collectible doll is inspired by President Barbie in Barbie The Movie. She looks absolutely radiant in her gorgeous presidential gown. A multi-layered skirt, sparkling gold accents, and satiny sash add beautiful detail to her cinematic look. Celebrating Barbie The Movie, this doll makes a great gift for fans and collectors alike.

toys.title: Star Wars Rey x Barbie Doll
toys.description: The Star Wars™ x Barbie® collection, inspired by the films’ original concept art, re-imagines iconic Star Wars characters through a distinctive Barbie™ high-fashion filter. As she was drawn into a galaxy-wide conflict between the First Order and the Resistance, the mysterious power of The Force set Rey™ on the path to discovering her destiny in a time when the Jedi Order was virtually extinct. This collectible Star Wars x Barbie® doll takes design inspiration from Rey’s legendary look to capture her adventurous spirit in a runway-ready silhouette.

toys.title: Barbie Looks Doll (Original, Brunette Wavy Hair)
toys.description: Featuring on-trend fashions with photo-worthy details, Barbie Looks™ dolls inspire the stylist within. With brand-new face sculpts and posable articulated bodies, they’re ready to style, pose, photograph and post. This Barbie Looks™ doll features a unique face sculpt and glossy brunette waves with golden highlights. Her premium fashion includes a white high-waisted skirt, cropped top with mesh paneling and t-strap sandals.

toys.title: Barbie Looks Doll With Mix-and-Match Fashions
toys.description: Barbie is the epitome of sophistication in her satiny jewel-toned fashions. Create customizable ensembles with two blouses, tailored pants, and a pencil skirt, as well as trendy accessories: two pairs of heels, two clutches, three bracelets, and bold cat-eye sunglasses. With mix-and-match looks, collectors can style and pose her for at-home photography. Her elegant face sculpt is framed by blunt-cut bangs and accented by a smoky eye and deep red lips.

toys.title: Barbie Looks Doll (Curvy, Curly Blonde Hair)
toys.description: Featuring on-trend fashions with photo-worthy details, Barbie Looks dolls inspire the stylist within. This latest wave takes its inspiration from color blocking, and all the dynamic design it sparks. #16 in the overall series, the bodycon silhouette and waist cut-out make her outfit mega trendy. She models a ruched crop top and satiny lavender mini shorts paired with ultra-high berry wedges. With a posable body featuring 18 points of articulation, Barbie is ready to style, pose, photograph, and post!

toys.title: Barbie Tribute Collection Vera Wang Barbie Doll
toys.description: The Barbie Tribute Collection celebrates visionaries whose incredible contributions have helped shape and impact culture. Inspired by a look from her 2017 ready-to-wear collection, Vera Wang Barbie Doll wears a monochromatic ensemble featuring a black romper under a chiffon dress with attached puff sleeves, a front slit, and the word LOVE featured at the hem.

toys.title: Barbie Ballet Wishes Doll
toys.description: Celebrate a special performance or inspire ballet dreams with Ballet Wishes Barbie doll. This beautiful Barbie doll is recital-ready with a satiny ballerina costume in pretty shades of pastel purple and blue and a matching, multi-layered tulle skirt. A gorgeous glittering tiara, tights and pink pointe shoes are the finishing touches. Flexible joints at the shoulders, elbows, wrists, hips and knees inspire endless posing possibilities and stunning displays.

toys.title: Barbie Rewind Doll - Workin' Out
toys.description: The Barbie Rewind series launches with the 80s Edition, a totally tubular throwback collection commemorating our fave pop-culture looks from the decade. Ready for aerobics class, this Barbie Rewind doll sports a pink bodysuit with a vintage Barbie logo print, legwarmers and must-have sweatbands. A high side ponytail, tennis shoes and a glittery belt complete her bodacious look.

toys.title: Star Wars Chewbacca x Barbie Doll
toys.description: The Star Wars™ x Barbie® collection, inspired by the films’ original concept art, re-imagines iconic Star Wars characters through a distinctive Barbie™ high-fashion filter. During his long life, Chewbacca™ has been many things: Wookiee warrior, ace smuggler and rebel hero. This collectible Star Wars x Barbie® doll takes design inspiration from Chewie’s legendary look, bringing a glamorous edge to signature costume elements in a runway-ready silhouette. Star Wars Chewbacca x Barbie® doll wears a lavish faux fur coat over a strapless dress with a fur skirt and bodice of vinyl and sheer organza.
